channel.title: Homes on Academic homepage of Florian Eisele
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Academic homepage of Florian Eisele

item.description: Biography Since October 2015 I am a post-doctoral researcher working in the representation theory group at City, University of London. I previously held a position at Vrije Universiteit Brussel in Belgium. I completed my PhD on “Group rings over the p-adic integers” at RWTH Aachen University in 2012. An up-to-date academic CV is available here.

item.title: Custom Section
item.description: This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section. To remove this section, either delete content/home/teaching.md or edit the frontmatter of the file to deactivate the widget by setting active = false.

item.title: Theses
item.description: PhD thesis: Group rings over the $p$-adic integers, defended in March 2012. Adviser: Professor Gabriele Nebe Diplom thesis: Algorithmische Behandlung $p$-adischer ganzzahliger Gruppenringe (in German), completed in October 2008. GAP -package called "orders", which allows computation with lattices over orders over the $p$-adic integers. In my thesis, I used this package to compute basic algebras of $\\mathbb Z_p G$ for certain finite groups $G$. More generally, this package implements GAP-objects and methods to compute with lattices over orders like $\\mathbb Z_p G$ (e.
